Wear a hat or a scarf: If you lose all your hair, wearing a hat or a scarf can provide additional protection from the sun's harmful rays.
Use sunscreen: Apply sunscreen on your scalp regularly to protect it from sunburn.
Wear a wig: Wearing a wig made of natural hair or synthetic fibers can provide additional protection from the sun.
Use a sun umbrella: Use a sun umbrella to provide additional shade to your scalp.
Wear a bandana: Wearing a bandana around your head can provide additional protection from the sun's harmful rays.
